attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By introducing cricket to the sports curriculum of state schools we will not only help keep kids fit and healthy but will also breed generations of quality cricket players

For years cricket has been the sport of the priveledged few. 

Only played in public schools, it needs to be made more available to the public after all it is a British invention which ought to be played more.

Most kids dont get the opportunity to experience playing cricket, it is a fabulous sport that is not being encouraged enough.
